arguments.name: X
arguments.description: The value for which you want the distribution

arguments.name: Mean
arguments.description: The arithmetic mean of the distribution

arguments.name: Standard_dev
arguments.description: The standard deviation of the distribution

arguments.name: Cumulative
arguments.description: A logical value that determines the form of the function. If cumulative is TRUE, NORMDIST returns the cumulative distribution function; if cumulative is FALSE, it returns the probability mass function.
